description: Rosemary Torgesen is admitted to Smokey Point on a court order after refusing to eat, drink and take medications for her schizophreniaz
Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Providence Regional Medical Center’s emergency room for “abnormal labs”
A Smokey Point staff member recommends Rosemary “be sent to a more medical psych unit”
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s emergency room for the second time for refusing to eat, drink and take medications
Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Northwest Hospital to be evaluated for admission, but she is returned that day after being medically cleared
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for abnormal labs
Rosemary falls at Smokey Point and is taken to the emergency room at Cascade Valley Hospital, where she is diagnosed with a broken arm
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for refusing to drink any fluids
Smokey Point records refer to her as being “bedbound”
Smokey Point records show she has developed a bed sore
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for refusing to eat, drink or take medication
Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time and refuses to accept her back
Providence physicians discover she has a broken right hip, apparently from a fall four weeks earlier
Rosemary Torgesen dies, with malnutrition given as the primary cause by the medical examiner
